readable.title: 3487131146_9d3aca387a
readable.content: A group of men stands near a tree as a racing car stirs up a cloud of dust on the gravel road beside them . A race car kicks up dirt and dust on a gravel track . Many people stand by watching a car smoke heavily . People are watching a race car speed thorugh the dirt . Six spectators watching a dirt racing car pass by in a cloud of dust .
